author: Staff Reporter
text:
EVMs arrive in Krishnagiri

As many as 4, 752 (balloting units control units) arrived here in the district from Gopalganj and Paschimchamparan districts in Bihar. The EVMs have been kept under tight security in two strong rooms, one each at the collectorate and the Revenue Divisional Officer here, an administration release said. Earlier, Collector C. Kathiravan inspected the EVMs.
title: EVMs arrive in Krishnagiri district
